newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.113pts to 101.608.
newsitem.headline: Czech BICS100 bond index rises 0.113pts to 101.608.

text.p: The BICS 100 index measuring the Czech Republic's most liquid bonds rose 0.113 points in Friday's trading to 101.608, bank Ceska Sporitelna said.
It said the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.002 points to 2.439 years.

The BICSG 100 index, which Ceska Sporitelna calculates using only government bonds, rose 0.144 points to 97.899, the bank said, and the duration of the index portfolio shortened by 0.002 points to 2.212 years.
It said the yield index YBICS 1000 fell 3.464 points to 1,114.017.
